ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Treant
ygData.msgSnippet: They nerfed the gnome toy drops?  When was this? I remember when Kerra Isle reopened it took me 5 minutes to do that quest.  Got a druid, tp to steamfont, 1
ygData.messageBody:
They nerfed the gnome toy drops? When was this?

I remember when Kerra Isle reopened it took me 5
minutes to do that quest. Got a druid, tp to
steamfont, 1 minute run to mino area, track one down,
kill, tp to tox, turn it in and wahoo.

Sucks that they nerfed it =( I told everyone I knew
to do it fast because there was no telling what Verant
would do to it.
